attributes.description: EXCELLENT CONDITION!!! This vehicle features the following: Aircon, Multi function steering, Electric windows,AUX,USB,Leather seats,Alloy rims,Tow bar. Warranty & Service plan available at dealership, test drives and trade-ins are most welcome. We guarantee friendly, reliable and honest service. We are open 6 days a week. Finance can be arranged through all major banks. For excellent service call us today or come see Leon, Suhail, Dineo, Brian, Abu or Zak. YOU CAN BUY WITH CONFIDENCE!!! PRICING EXCLUDES: ON THE ROAD LICENSE REG, SMASH GRAB, TRACKER, T&Cs APPLY.
